title: "Sepsis: Assessing a Biomarker & EMR‐Based Machine Learning Algorithm"
excerpt: "Dr. Bashir and colleagues conducted a study, published in Clinical & Translational Science, in which they applied machine learning using EMR data and 15 novel biomarkers that are uncommonly measured to identify patients with sepsis."
